name: Mushrooms
description:
This is a 2 - 3 or 4 players game, but all of you play on the same PC !

Each turn, you have to build one fence on the map.

If you close a part of the map with your fence :

        ->  this part belongs to you for ever and brings you points .

        -> Points depend on the number of mushrooms and tiles you have in your closure.

        -> You get an extra fence !

When all the map is conquered by someone , the game is over and we count points to know who wins the game.

Solo Mode is available to ( with 2 AI level)
